creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Lloyd Olson in memory of Selma Groethe
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Huipil (blouse) from Chichicastenango, 1960-1970. Cotton, wool, brocading, rayon triangles and rosettes, buttons in rosettes. Embroidered signature Tomas, Tomasa P.T. Overall floral design, sun-ray neckline and rosettes on shoulders only.
medium: Cotton, wool, synthetic, buttons; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery, appliqu√©
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
